examples: My dad bought a stylish suit for his friend's wedding.
The rich man bought a big house and a fancy car.
We bought a bag of coarse sea salt from the specialty store.
She bought an expensive dress for a special occasion.
I bought a pound of fresh meat from the butcher.
words.defineEn: to get something in exchange for paying money
words.defineVi: để có được một cái gì đó để đổi lấy việc trả tiền

examples: Shergar film falls at the first fence in Cannes.
Underneath the orange tree, the leaves gently fall.
The fall knocked the wind out of me.
The leaves fall from the trees in autumn.
People are falling like flies from COVID-19.
words.defineEn: to quickly move from a high place toward the ground
words.defineVi: để nhanh chóng di chuyển từ một nơi cao xuống đất

examples: A touch of maple extract in the pancake batter gives them a delightful maple syrup taste.
The finance minister's fall from grace gave his enemies great satisfaction.
Give sweetsop a try!
The morgue gives me the jitters.
This old house gives me the willies.
words.defineEn: to offer a thing to a person
words.defineVi: để cung cấp một điều cho một người

examples: I heard the tiny squeak of a mouse in the walls.
I hear the sound of seagulls near the sea.
To hear both sides of the argument.
The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
Have you heard the news?
words.defineEn: to notice the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để ý đến âm thanh mà một người hoặc vật đang tạo ra

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
Red wine leaves a stain.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: to go away from somewhere or someone
words.defineVi: đi khỏi một nơi nào đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: Generally, the article reads very well.
My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
Read my lips.
Read my lips.
Teachers should read more poetry to children.
words.defineEn: to look at written or printed words and understand their meaning
words.defineVi: nhìn vào các từ được viết hoặc in và hiểu ý nghĩa của chúng

examples: See full dictionary entry for heart.
See my car?
This stadium has seen many thrilling football games.
The twentieth century saw dramatic changes in most areas of life.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: to notice a thing or person with our eyes
words.defineVi: để ý một điều hoặc người với đôi mắt của chúng tôi

examples: The figures tell a different story.
To tell stories/jokes/lies.
She again told tales out of school.
Do tell me!
Tell me in words of one syllable!
words.defineEn: to use words and give someone information
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ và cung cấp cho ai đó thông tin
